With its exceptional features and quality, it's truly worth every penny. I'm extending this opportunity to you with a special introductory offer of $110. Don't miss out on this chance to own something that will greatly enhance your experience. Let me know if you're interested in securing this deal! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $110.

(2) Reject Alice's offer
